name: Miramar By Windsor Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlantica, 3668 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking, as pricing is dynamic, we will get back to you straight away. HeadLine: Near Copacabana FortLocation: With a stay at Miramar Hotel by Windsor in Rio de Janeiro (Copacabana), you ll be steps from Copacabana Beach and Avenida Atlantica. This 5-star hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Copacabana Fort and 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Arpoador Beach.Rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 200 guestrooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Dining: Enjoy Italian cuisine at Alloro al Miramar, a beachfront restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.CheckIn Instructions: Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed No onsite parking is available This property accepts credit cards and debit cards; cash is not accepted This property reserves the right to pre-authorize the guest s credit card prior to arrival. Safety features at this property include a smoke detector and window guardsSpecial Instructions: Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.Dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/café. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. name: ibis budget RJ Praia de Botafogo
address: Praca Joia Valansi 24, Botafogo, Rio de Janeiro
description: Looking for an ibis hotel in Botafogo to stay in comfort and economy? The ibis budget RJ Praia de Botafogo has its doors open for you. The rooms accommodate two to three people, and have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi, and some have a beautiful view of Corcovado, the city's postcard. Breakfast is optional and includes gluten-free options, and the convenience store is available 24 hours a day. In addition, the hotel has parking, Business Center and is dog friendly (for a fee).accorhotels.comRead less

name: Lagune Barra Hotel
address: 6555 Av. Salvador Allende, Rio de Janeiro 22783-127
description: Situated in Rio de Janeiro, 27 km from Maracanã Stadium, Lagune Barra Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna and room service. At the hotel, every room includes a wardrobe. Every room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Lagune Barra Hotel have a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Lagune Barra Hotel can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. The hotel offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at Lagune Barra Hotel. Speaking English, Spanish and Portuguese, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 28 km from the accommodation, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 33 km from Lagune Barra Hotel.Read less

name: Rondonia Palace
address: Rua Buarque de Macedo 60, Rio de Janeiro 22220-030
description: Located only 300 metres from Flamengo Beach, Rondônia Palace offers spacious rooms with free internet and TV. The hotel is 200 metres from both Catete and Largo do Machado subway stations, giving easy access to other parts of Rio. Copacabana Beach can be reached in a 10-minute ride. The famous Sugarloaf Mountain is only 3.5 km away. Hotel Rondônia Palace has rooms fitted with wooden flooring and bright walls. Guests start the day with a varied buffet breakfast providing tropical fruits, fresh juices, cakes and pastries. À la carte specialities are served for lunch and dinner, while exotic drinks can be ordered from the bar. A computer area with free internet is available in the lobby, and the front desk is open 24 hours a day.Read less

name: Hilton Copacabana Rio de Janeiro
address: Avenida Atlantica, 1020, Rio de Janeiro 22010-000
description: The 5-star Hilton Rio de Janeiro Copacabana is ideally located across from the blue waters of Copacabana Beach. It features an elegant spa and a rooftop pool, both with splendid sea views. Hilton Rio de Janeiro Copacabana offers bright, sophisticated rooms with air conditioning, a TV and a minibar. They are elegantly styled with wooden furniture, contemporary decor and warm, natural tones. Most rooms feature amazing ocean views. A popular buffet breakfast is served every morning with fresh fruits and pastries. The spa at the hotel has a variety of treatments, and there is a second swimming pool on the 4th floor, where guests can find the hotel restaurant. They are also welcome to exercise or have a sauna session in the fitness centre. Charming shops, restaurants and lively bars are found just 2 blocks away from this hotel. Copacabana Fort is 3.2 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 9.6 km away, while GaleÃ£o International Airport is at a distance of 27.6 km.Read less

name: Novotel Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca
address: Avenida Lucio Costa 5210, Rio de Janeiro 22630012
description: Looking for a well-deserved rest? Novotel Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca is available! Cozy rooms for couples, singles and families. Overlooking the sea, with A/C and WiFi. The Restaurant 365 serves international cuisine, plus Brazilian food and drinks at the bar. Use our meeting rooms for events. Relax in the swimming pool and gym, plus a kids space and ironing room. Your pet is welcome for a fee.accorhotels.comRead less

name: ibis Rio Porto Atlantico
address: Avenida Professor Pereira Reis 49, Rio de Janeiro 20220-800
description: The ibis Rio de Janeiro Porto Atlântico is a modern budget hotel, located in the Santo Cristo neighborhood, three blocks from the sea. It offers rooms with comfortable beds, air conditioning, cable TV and free WIFI. The hotel also features a delicious breakfast buffet in the restaurant. All of this 0.6 miles (1 km) from the Novo Rio highway, 1.6 miles (2.5 km) from Porto Maravilha and 3.7 miles (6 km) from Santos Dumont Airport. What's more, small dogs are also welcome.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Ibis Rio de Janeiro Barra Da Tijuca
address: Avenida Gilberto Amado, No. 41, Rio de Janeiro 22620-061
description: A vibrant and welcoming hotel, ibis Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca offers the best in comfort and affordable accommodation. Its rooms are comfortable with free WiFi, air conditioning and work desk. Also, all rooms have windows overlooking the sea or the lagoon. This hotel in Barra da Tijuca RJ has a meeting room with a capacity of 400 seats. The hotel is pet friendly for a fee and is close to the city's most important events. We follow all sanitation and hygiene protocols for safety against COVID-19.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Ritz Leblon
address: Rua Ataulfo de Paiva 1280, Rio de Janeiro
description: Just 200 metres from Rio de Janeiro’s Leblon beach and 500 metres from Antero de Quental tube station, the charming Ritz Leblon features a gym and a pool with wooden deck and sunloungers. Its restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. Free WiFi is available throughout. Featuring a stereo system, minibar and an LCD TV with cable channels, the air-conditioned rooms boast a bright, contemporary décor. Guests can enjoy cocktails at Tropical Bar located in the lobby. Ritz Leblon is 6.5 km from the world-famous Copacabana Beach, and 14.6 km from Santos Dumont Airport. Christ the Redeemer monument and Maracanã Stadium are 13 km away. Parking is available, and charges are applicable.Read less

name: Mercure Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca
address: Avenida do Pepê 56, Rio de Janeiro 22620-170
description: Mercure Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca, modern and perfect for your business or leisure stay. Overlooking Pepê Beach, the bedrooms are suitable for couples, singles, and families, with A/C and free WIFI. Enjoy breakfast, lunch, and dinner at the restaurant with a sea view. Host your corporate event in one of our 9 halls for up to 400 people. The hotel also has a sauna, gym, and complimentary ironing room.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Plage Hotel
address: Praia da Guanabara 1391, Rio de Janeiro 21911-090
description: Right on Praia de Guanabara beach, this hotel is 12 km from Galeão International Airport. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and free parking. A restaurant, bar and 24-hour reception are available. Rooms at Hotel Plage provide cable TV, a radio and a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Bed linens are included. Rio city centre and Maracanã Stadium are both 22 km away. Novo Rio Bus Station and Santos Dumont Airport are 25 km from Hotel Plage.Read less

name: Americas Townhouse Hotel
address: Av. Cesar Morani Comendador 140, Rio de Janeiro 22790-705
description: Set in Rio de Janeiro, 29 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens, Americas Townhouse Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Situated conveniently in the Recreio dos Bandeirantes district, this hotel provides a bar, as well as a sauna and a hammam. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. All rooms come with air conditioning and a TV, and certain units at Americas Townhouse Hotel have a safety deposit box. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Americas Townhouse Hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Brazilian, Pizza and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 31 km from Americas Townhouse Hotel, while Maracanã Stadium is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.Read less

name: Fairmont Rio de Janeiro Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlântica, 4240 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22070-002
description: Experience a unique stay at Fairmont Rio de Janeiro Copacabana for business or leisure. Enjoy the spa, sauna, massage and beauty salon services at the Fairmont SPA, including an infinity pool. The hotel has a mixology bar and restaurant specialized in seafood, plus meeting and event rooms, including beautiful panoramic view of Rio de Janeiro.accorhotels.comRead less

name: La Suite by Dussol
address: Rua Jackson De Figueiredo 501, Rio de Janeiro
description: La Suite by Dussol is a charming guesthouse which boasts an exquisite infinite pool and is finely decorated. Guests can enjoy a wellness centre, as well as taste the recipes at the guesthouse´s a la carte restaurant. Wi-Fi connection is free. Some of the charming rooms at La Suite features a balcony and a king size bed. They are air conditioned and come with a king size bed, wardrobe, Ipod docking station and private bathrooms. Selected units boasts scenic sea views. Spa facilities include massages and esthetic treatments. The guest house is 17 km from Riocentro Convention Centre, 10 km from Leblon Beach and 24 km from Maracanã Stadium. Santos Dumont Airport is 25 km away. The property offers parking in a location nearby at an extra cost.Read less

name: Plaza Barra First
address: Avienda Das Americas, 7897, Rio de Janeiro 22793-081
description: Located in Barra da Tijuca, the 4-star Plaza Barra First welcomes you to spend peaceful and joyful moments. Featuring free WiFi, rooms are all air-conditioned and equipped with a cable TV and a minibar. They are tastefully styled and provide a bathroom, fitted with a shower. Room service is available. The Olympic Park is located 9.8 km from Plaza Barra First and Pontal Beach is 10 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 37 km away, while Galeão International Airport is at a distance of 33 km.Read less

name: Emiliano Rio
address: Av. Atlântica, 3804, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Boasting an outdoor infinity pool, Emiliano Rio is set in a privileged location in Rio de Janeiro, beachfront to Copacabana Beach. The contemporary architecture values the natural light and the sea view, offering guests a special and unique connection with the city. Free WiFi is provided, and private parking is available on site. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. Some rooms have a seating area for guests' convenience. Every room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet, with bathrobes provided. It is also fitted with slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Emiliano Rio, guests can taste a contemporary Brazilian cuisine made from organic products at the on-site restaurant. Other hotel facilities include a spa where guests can relax and a fitness centre where they can exercise. The rooftop boasts a swimming pool and views to the beach. Ipanema Beach is 1.2 km from Emiliano Rio, while the famous Sugarloaf Mountain is 7.5 km away, and Christ The Redeemer is at a distance of 8.4 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from the property, while Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

name: Anna All Suites
address: R. Francisco Otaviano 155, Rio de Janeiro 22080-046
description: AnnA All Suites Ipanema offers a rooftop pool and a sauna, as well as accommodation with a kitchenette in Rio de Janeiro, 200 metres from Ipanema Beach. This aparthotel features free private parking, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The aparthotel has family rooms. The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, kitchenware, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At the aparthotel, every unit comes with bed linen and towels. Available each morning, the breakfast at the property includes buffet dishes along with a selection of fruits and cheese. Arpoador Beach is 200 metres from the aparthotel, while Diabo Beach is 400 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 12 km from AnnA All Suites Ipanema.Read less

name: Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro
address: Av. Niemeyer, 769, Rio de Janeiro 22450-221
description: Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL is ideally set right in front of São Conrado beach and offers an unique option for those looking for the luxury of an urban resort. The hotel is located within the grounds of a historic building, designed by Oscar Niemeyer and surrounded by Burle Marx gardens. The hotel has an outdoor pool, a spa and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy exclusive drinks and sophisticated tapas at the Bardot Pool Bar, and also benefit from the contemporary cuisine restaurant Sereia. WiFi is available throughout the property All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL are decorated in warm colors and offer Trussardi bed linen, LED TV, minibar, digital safe and a dock station. Ensuite bathroom offers complimentary amenities, bathrobes and hairdryer. São Conrado subway station is only 750 metres from the property. Pedra da Gávea and Jardim Botanico can be both reached within 6.5 km. Copacabana beach is 11 km from Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 13 km from the property, while Tom Jobim International Airport is 25 km away.Read less

name: Mirador Rio Hotel
address: Rua Tonelero, 338, Rio de Janeiro 22030-000
description: Located 650 metres from Copacabana Beach, this hotel's swimming pool boasts panoramic views of Rio de Janeiro. The buffet breakfast is served daily in a luxurious dining area. Guests can enjoy local and international cuisine in Restaurant Vila Real. WiFi is available. All rooms at Mirador Rio Copacabana Hotel features a minibar, cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some offer a dry sauna and additional space. Non-smoking rooms are available. As well as an outdoor pool, Mirador Rio offers a fitness centre. The lounge bar serves a wide variety of drinks, including tropical cocktails. The 24-hour front desk can arrange room service, car and bicycle rental and dry cleaning services. Private parking is available. This 4-star hotel is just 250 metres from Siqueira Campos Subway. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 9 km and Galeão International Airport is 22.5 km from the property.Read less

name: Laghetto Stilo Barra Rio
address: R. Marcelo Roberto, 65, Rio de Janeiro 22630-190
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, a fitness centre and a business centre, Laghetto Stilo Barra is a beach front hotel loctated on Rio de Janeiro's Barra da Tijuca Beach. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. Free WiFi is available troughout the property. The modern decorated rooms all include air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Laghetto Stilo Barra has a 24-hour front desk and private parking is available on site. Tijuca Forest National Park is 11 km from Laghetto Barra Rio, while Post 12 - Leblon is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 22 km from Laghetto Stilo Barra.Read less

name: Lifestyle Laghetto Collection
address: Rua Professor Coutinho Frois, 10, Rio de Janeiro 22620-360
description: Located in a privileged place, just in front of Barra da Tijuca Beach, Lifestyle Laghetto Collection offers fine and elegant accommodation in Rio de Janeiro city. The hotel features an infinity pool boasting an amazing ocean view and a bar where guests can enjoy a drink. Free WiFi is available in public areas. All rooms at Lifestyle Laghetto Collection feature a balcony, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A bath is offered in certain rooms. The private bathroom is fitted with an walk in shower and a hairdryer. A 24-hour front desk is also offered. Village Mall ia 5 km from the hotel, while Jardim Oceânico Metro Station is 1.4 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 25 km from the Lifestyle Laghetto Collection.Read less

name: Promenade Palladium Leblon
address: Rua General Artigas 200, Rio de Janeiro 22441-140
description: Situated in Leblon, the 4-star Promenade Palladium Leblon invites you to enjoy the comfort of its rooms and suites just 400 metres from Leblon Beach. Free WiFi is available. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and contain a cable TV and other amenities. Most rooms have a balcony as well. Suites feature a living room and a kitchen. After relaxing in the swimming pool, guests can exercise in the gym. Lagoa Remo Stadium is 2 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 12.3 km, while Galeão International Airport is 29.1 km away. Daily, guests can enjoy the Promenade Hour: selection of antipasti.Read less

name: Rio Othon Palace
address: Avenida Atlantica 3264, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Located beachfront to Copacabana beach, Rio Othon Palace features a rooftop pool with excellent views of the Sugarloaf Mountain and an on-site fitness centre. Boasting panoramic sea views, breakfast is served on the 3rd floor. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the property. Each of the air-conditioned accommodations at Rio Othon Palace has a balcony, cable TV and minibar. Some offer views of the sea and a separate seating area. Parking is provided on site, subject to availability. At the Skylab Restaurant and Bar, located on the 30th floor, guests can taste Brazilian and international cuisine, as well as a tradicional 'feijoada' every Saturday. There are a number of shops and restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. Cantagalo metro station is 450 metres from Rio Othon Palace, whilst Copacabana Fort is 1 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 11 km and Galeão International Airport is 23.8 km from the property.Read less

name: Yoo2 Rio De Janeiro By Intercity
address: Praia De Botafogo 242, Rio de Janeiro 22250-145
description: Located in front of Botafogo Beach, and offering amazing view to Sugarloaf and Corcovado Mountains, Yoo2 Rio de Janeiro boasts an outdoor pool. Guests can also enjoy drinks at the rooftop bar. Rooms at Yoo2 Rio de Janeiro have an exclusive design and feature air conditioning, flat-screen TV, and a minibar. Private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The relaxed Lobby Lounge is the perfect place for a nice breakfast and a morning coffee whilst catching up with the day’s news. Copacabana Beach is 5 km from Yoo2 Rio de Janeiro. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 4 km from the property.Read less

name: Radisson Hotel Barra Rio de Janeiro
address: Av. Evandro Lins e Silva, 600, Rio de Janeiro 22631-470
description: Located in the upscale Barra da Tijuca neighborhood about 30 minutes outside of downtown Rio, Radisson Hotel Barra Rio de Janeiro places you within easy reach of local shopping and beaches. When you find a break between meetings, you can visit Chico Mendes Municipal Nature Park or Barra Shopping. Each morning, join us at Origens restaurant for a complimentary breakfast buffet. We also offer free WiFi, a business center, a fitness center, and a rooftop pool. Our guest rooms ensure a memorable stay with great amenities like a flat-screen TV, a large desk, and a coffeemaker. Premium rooms include one complimentary bottle of water per day. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice HotelsRead less

name: Riale Brisa Barra
address: Av. Lucio Costa, 5700, Rio de Janeiro 22620-172
description: Brisa Barra Hotel features adult and children pools and is located in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach. Guests can enjoy their on-site gym, restaurant, dry and steam sauna. Free WiFi is available throughout the property, and parking is available for a fee. The rooms at Brisa Barra are modern and fitted with light hypo-allergenic floors and air conditioning. They boast a balcony with exterior views. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional and international specialties, as well as a selection of drinks in the hotel’s restaurant. The hotel offers 7 different meeting and event rooms. The Olympic Park is located 10 km from Brisa Barra Hotel and Pontal Beach is only 13 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 30.8 km away, while Galeão International Airport is at a distance of 33.8 km.Read less

name: Novotel RJ Praia de Botafogo
address: Praia De Botafogo 330 Botafogo, Rio de Janeiro 22250-040
description: Hotel well-located in the wonderful city, Novotel RJ Praia de Botafogo boasts a beautiful breathtaking view and modern facilities for your stay. The rooms are comfortable, air-conditioned and with WIFI. Options for singles and office. This hotel on botafogo beach also has restaurant, event hall, business center, beauty salon, sauna and kids space. Your pet is welcome, for fees.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro
address: Av. Lucio Costa 9600, Rio de Janeiro 22795-007
description: Boasting an out-door pool and a spa, Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro is located in the heart of Barra da Tijuca, between the ocean, the lake and the mountains, just across the street from Reserva Beach. The hotel has a sauna and a fitness centre with a yoga studio. Guests can enjoy a meal at one of the three restaurants. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and offers a furnished balcony. Rooms also offer a bathtub, bathroom amenities and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and shops at the property. Beach service is available and offers chairs, parasols and towels. The spa offers different massages and treatments in its nine private suites. The spa also has locker rooms with saunas and steam rooms. Guests can also enjoy several resort activities such as daily physical activities, cocktail tasting, bike experience and welcome drinks at the restaurant, for an additional charge. Children can enjoy several toys, books, artistic activities, baby area and video games at our kids club. Jeunesse Arena is located nearby, whilst Cidade das Artes is 3.2 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 26 km from Grand Hyatt Rio de Janeiro.Read less

name: Novotel Rio de Janeiro Santos Dumont
address: Avenida Rua Marechal Camara 300, Rio de Janeiro 20020-080
description: Just 400 meters from Santos Dumont Airport, Novotel RJ Santos Dumont has large, functional apartments with SmartTV, WiFi, sauna, plus event lounge and fitness center. The restaurant serves the best quality regional cuisine, or relax at the IT'S TIME bar for drinks, snacks and special coffees. Ideal for business or family, the hotel offers a complete infrastructure of comfort and well being.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Samba Rio Convention
address: Estrada Dos Bandeirantes 6265, Rio de Janeiro 22780-180
description: Situated in Rio de Janeiro and only 27 km from Maracanã Stadium, Samba Rio Convention features accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. This aparthotel offers accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 27 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens. This air-conditioned aparthotel has 1 bedroom, a satellite flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are offered in the aparthotel. The property has an outdoor dining area. A bar can be found on-site. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 29 km from the aparthotel, while Tijuca Forest National Park is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 32 km from Samba Rio Convention.Read less

name: Hilton Barra Rio de Janeiro
address: 1430 Abelardo Bueno Avenue, Rio de Janeiro 22775-040
description: Ideally located in the dynamic business district of Barra da Tijuca, Hilton Barra Rio de Janeiro hotel is just moments from the Olympic Park. Guests at this contemporary hotel in Rio de Janeiro can enjoy easy access to popular restaurants, lively bars and nightclubs, shopping, and leisure opportunities. Catch a music concert or sporting event at the Jeunesse Arena. Spend the day at Praia do Pepe, a beautiful stretch of beach that is very popular with surfers and kite boarders. Admire stunning views from our Rooftop Bar and Pool. Also delight yourself with a big variety of art throughout the hotel. Organize a business event at this Rio de Janeiro hotel with five versatile meeting spaces. For larger functions, choose one of the hotel's impressive ballrooms. Our dedicated team of event staff will help ensure the success of your conference, training session or wedding reception. Relax and stay productive in a comfortable and elegant guest room or suite, equipped with WiFi and an HDTV. Work out with contemporary exercise equipment in the fitness center, or swim in the sparkling waters of our rooftop pool as you admire wonderful views over the lakes of Barra da Tijuca. Savor tempting Brazilian specialties prepared with seasonal ingredients in our relaxed onsite restaurant and unwind after dinner with a cocktail in the inviting bar.HiltonRead less

name: Intercity Rio de Janeiro Porto Maravilha
address: Rua Cordeiro da Graca, 598, Rio de Janeiro 20220-410
description: Conveniently set in Santo Cristo neighbourhood, near the renovated Rio de Janeiro Harbour, Intercity Rio de Janeiro Porto Maravilha offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with Guanabara Bay views, private parking on site and free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms boast sea views and feature a flat-screen TV, a safe and a wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar or exercise in the fitness centre. For your convenience, a 24-hour front desk and a vending machine are available. A rich breakfast buffet is served daily at Intercity Rio de Janeiro Porto Maravilha, including an array of breads, fruits and hot and cold drinks. With easy access to the city centre, Intercity Rio de Janeiro Porto Maravilha is just 1 km from Museum of Tomorrow, 1.5 km from AquaRio and 3 km from Sambodrome Marquês de Sapucaí. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 3 km from the hotel.Read less

name: Apart hotel Twin Towers
address: 3150 Avenida Lúcio Costa, Rio de Janeiro 22630-010
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro, 100 metres from Barra da Tijuca Beach and 16 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens, Apart hotel Twin Towers provides accommodation with free WiFi, a garden, pool views, and access to a fitness room and a sauna. The accommodation is air conditioned and comes with a spa bath. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 18 km from Apart hotel Twin Towers, while Tijuca Forest National Park is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.Read less

name: Arosa Rio Hotel
address: Avenida Henrique Valadares, 150, Centro, Rio de Janeiro 20231-031
description: Arosa Rio Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is located in downtown Rio de Janeiro. A 24-hour room service and shuttle services are available. The accommodation at Arosa Rio Hotel includes an LCD TV, sofa and minibar. Buffet breakfast includes a variety of fruits, juices, breads and cold cuts. The menu includes various Brazilian and international specialities, as well as tropical cocktails. Hotel Arosa Riois located 2 km from Carioca metro station and 3 km from Marina da Glória. Santos Dumont Airport is 2.9 km away, and Galeão International Airport can be reached within 17 km.Read less

name: Pousada Barra Sol
address: Avenida Grande Canal, 301 Barra da Tijuc, Rio de Janeiro 22649-085
description: No description found

name: Cliffside - Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: Escada Flora Mai, 177, Rio de Janeiro 22611-120
description: Featuring pool views, CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a bar, barbecue facilities and a shared lounge, around 300 metres from Joatinga Beach. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The restaurant serves African and American dishes, as well as Argentinian and Brazilian cuisine. Providing a terrace, some units are air conditioned and include a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with sea views and an outdoor dining area. At the homestay, some units are allergy-free. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. Guests can make the most of the garden, pool with a view and yoga classes on offer at the homestay. Bike hire and car hire are available at CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa and the area is popular for cycling and pub crawls. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the accommodation. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 13 km from CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont, 23 km from the homestay, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Read less

name: Hotel Caracas Rio
address: Praia da Guanabara, 633, Rio de Janeiro
description: Hotel Caracas Rio is located on Praia de Guanabara Beach and is just a 10-minute drive from the Ilha Plaza Shopping Centre. It features modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Antonio Carlos Jobim International Airport is just 5 km from the hotel. Caracas Rio Hotel offers rooms with an LCD TV, a telephone and a private bathroom. Tastefully styled, they provide white linens and wooden décor. Some rooms offer extra luxury and include a living room and a minibar. Fresh fruits, breads and cold meats are served on the breakfast buffet, as well as tea, coffee and juices. A variety of dishes and drinks can also be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant and bar lounge. Guests can utilise the business centre and take advantage of room service. 24-hour reception and a laundry facility are available and a concierge is always at hand to assist with any needs travellers may have. Tom Jobim International Airport is located 8 km from the property.Read less

name: ibis Rio de Janeiro Santos Dumont
address: Rua Marechal Camara 280 Centro, Rio de Janeiro
description: Perfect for those travelling to Rio de Janeiro for business or sightseeing, ibis Rio de Janeiro Santos Dumont offers spacious and comfortable bedrooms at a very affordable price. Bedrooms with hairdryer, air conditioning and WIFI, restaurant breakfast full of options to start your day well. Just 1km from Santos Dumont Airport, close to the subway. And what's more, your dog is welcome.accorhotels.com

name: Casajomo Art & Food B&b
address: 136 R. Laurinda Santos Lôbo, Rio de Janeiro 20240-270
description: CasaJOMO Art & Food B&B is situated in Rio de Janeiro and has a rooftop pool and mountain views. The property features pool and garden views, and is 1.6 km from Escadaria Selarón. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes, units at the bed and breakfast also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and pancakes are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. At casaJOMO Art & Food B&B, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner and specialises in African cuisine. A variety of wellness packages are available for guests to get rejuvenated in-house. Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy walking tours nearby, or make the most of the garden. Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro is 3.2 km from casaJOMO Art & Food B&B, while Modern Art Museum is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont, 4 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Linx Galeão
address: Avenida 20 de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro 21941-900
description: Conveniently located only 500 m from Galeão - Tom Jobim International Airport in Rio de Janeiro, Linx Hotel has a 24-hour gym, pool and a bar. It is 15 km from central Rio. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a 32" LED TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hot shower. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional and international specialties, as well as a selection of drinks in the hotel’s restaurant. Linx Hotel International Airport Galeão also offers 24-hour free shuttle service and screens with flight hours. Guests can also benefit from the Mercato, a grab-and-go service for quick meals and snacks. It is set 17 km from Maracanã Stadium and 25 km from Copacabana.

name: ibis Rio de Janeiro Botafogo
address: Rua Paulino Fernandes 39 Botafogo, Rio de Janeiro
description: ibis Rio de Janeiro Botafogo perfectly combines comfort and mobility. Standard bedrooms with extra bed for children up to 12 years old, WIFI and air conditioning. It is close to the subway and bus station, easy access to the main sights of the city, such as Copacabana Beach, Museu do Amanha, Maracana Stadium, Corcovado and Sugarloaf mountain. The neighborhood has a very busy nightlife, with bars and pubs.accorhotels.com

name: Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star
address: Rua Prudente De Moraes, 729, Rio de Janeiro 22420-041
description: Situated one block from trendy Ipanema Beach, Mc Flats Ipanema is just 9 km from Santos Dumont Airport. Complete leisure facilities include an exclusive Maria Bonita Wellness Spa, modern gym and heated pool. The spacious apartments at Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star have wooden furnishings and floors, and kitchenettes with a microwave and oven. Some have private balconies. Open for lunch, the Spazziano Restaurant serves a menu with organic dishes. For dining, several restaurants and bars are within a 10 minute walk from the hotel. Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star is a 10-minute drive from Leblon Beach, and 20 km from Galeao Airport. It is also 20-minutes drive from Rio´s main bus terminal. Ipanema Beach Star offers both free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking.

name: Villa Alexandrino
address: R. Alm. Alexandrino, 2671 - Santa Teresa, Rio de Janeiro 20241-263
description: Villa Alexandrino offers a spectacular view of the Guanabara Bay and is located in the charming district of Santa Teresa. Built in the late 19th century, high on a hill, with a swimming pool, beautiful staircases and frescos, this guest house is surrounded by lush greenery and tropical flora. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room or on the terrace. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Free WiFi is provided. The spacious rooms at Villa Alexandrino boast antique-style décor and furniture. They feature an air-conditioner, wardrobe and some offer views. Other facilities include various lounge and reading areas. There is also a shared balcony with mountain and city views. Villa Alexandrino is located 3.5 km from the lively Lapa district, 8 km from Maracanã Stadium and 10 km from Copacabana Beach. The Santos Dumont Airport is only 5.5 km away. Private parking is free.

name: Pousada Cantinho do Joá
address: 680 Rua Presciliano da Silva Casa de pedra, Rio de Janeiro 22611-130
description: Featuring a bar, garden and views of lake, Pousada Cantinho do Joá is located in Rio de Janeiro, 300 metres from Joatinga Beach. The property is situated 350 metres from Barra da Tijuca, 3.3 km from Pedra Bonita and 6 km from Tijuca Forest National Park. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house each room is fitted with a private bathroom. Guests at Pousada Cantinho do Joá can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 9 km from the accommodation, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 17 km from Pousada Cantinho do Joá.

name: pousada do rei
address: rua barros de alarcão 321, Itaguaí 23024-340
description: Situated in Pedra de Guaratiba, pousada do rei offers beachfront accommodation 48 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens and features various facilities, such as an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a restaurant. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and room service for guests. At the inn, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Pousada do rei offers some rooms with sea views, and rooms are fitted with a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide advice at the reception. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 59 km from pousada do rei.
